'''Mystical Beasts''' are enemies which are strongly affected by the [[elements]]. As opposed to [[Elemental Lifeforms]], they are not purely made out of elemental energy; however, enemies in this category are generally more resistant to the elemental style that they represent. 

Common and Elite Mystical Beasts can be found across [[Teyvat]].
